45.eng-name: Chapters on The Virtues of the Qur'an
45.ara-name: كتاب ثواب القرآن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated 'Abdullah bin 'Amr:that the Prophet (ﷺ) said: "It shall be said - meaning to the one who memorized the Qur'an - 'Recite, and rise up, recite (melodiously) as you would recite in the world. For indeed your rank shall be at the last Ayah you recited

chapter.eng-name: 'Indeed, The One Who Does Not Have The Qur'an Inside Him (His Heart), Is Like The Ruined House'
